description: This restaurant occupies one of the oldest houses in San Vigilio. It serves typical Ladin specialities in wood - clad dining rooms and has a delightful Stube. Among the various specialities on the menu, the crafun (savoury krapfe stuffed with a ragú sauce) are particularly worth sampling.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
